pages.text: This mod adds two new mobs and one villager profession.  $(br2)New mobs drop important resources, and the new villager sells some items from this mod. $(br2) [Not reviewed] The chance of spawn hostile creatures in this mod can be modified in the configuration file. When set to 0, these monsters will not spawn.
Spawns in plains biomes at night, they will attack players and maids with danmaku.
Spawns in forest biomes at night, they will attack players and maids.
Found in vanilla villages, they trade for some items from this mod.
